data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio do Maracana have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Throw-in Bahia.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Bahia.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Bruno Henrique.
Great play from Giorgian De Arrascaeta to set up the goal.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Flamengo are pushing forward but Gabriel Barbosa's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Everton Ribeiro (Flamengo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Flamengo are down to 10 men after Gabriel Barbosa has been shown a red card.
In the minute 12, Mano Menezes (Bahia) is making a first substitution, with Daniel replacing Edson.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Juninho Capixaba (Bahia) gets a yellow card.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Nino Paraiba for Bahia drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 24, Ernando (Bahia) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Bahia throw-in in Flamengo's half.
In the minute 25, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Bahia's Gregore gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
In the minute 29, Bahia drive upfield and Gregore gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
Bruno Henrique for the home team is judged to be offside.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 31, Bahia pushes forward through Gilberto, whose finish on goal is saved.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 33, Goal! Flamengo extend their lead to 2-0 through Mauricio Isla.
That's a fine assist from Bruno Henrique.
Nino Paraiba (Bahia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 36, Juan Pablo Ramirez (Bahia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 38, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Flamengo's Giorgian De Arrascaeta misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Pablo Ramirez of Bahia gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Flamengo's Bruno Henrique is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 44, Rodrigo Caio (Flamengo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, 5 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Rio de Janeiro.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo are coming forward and Bruno Henrique gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Bahia at Estadio do Maracana.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 46, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bahia make their second substitution with Gabriel Novaes replacing Ramon.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bahia's Gilberto has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Goal! Bahia reduce the deficit to 2-1 through Juan Pablo Ramirez.
In the minute 50, Daniel with an assist there.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Goal! Gilberto equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
In the minute 56, Juninho Capixaba instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 59, Goal! Bahia take a 2-3 lead through a well-placed header from Gilberto.
Rossi with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 61, Flamengo push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Bruno Henrique gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bahia defence.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In Rio de Janeiro, Giorgian De Arrascaeta of Flamengo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 62, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza blows against Flamengo's Gerson for offside.
In Rio de Janeiro Bahia's Rossi is caught offside.
So close for Flamengo as Joao Gomes's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 64, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Rossi for Bahia who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Bahia at Estadio do Maracana.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Juan Pablo Ramirez (Bahia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bahia are in shooting range from this free kick.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Filipe Luis (Flamengo) gets booked by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
In the minute 72, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the away team a throw-in.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo.
The home team have replaced Giorgian De Arrascaeta with Pedro. This is the first substitution made today by Rogerio Ceni.
Throw-in Bahia.
In the minute 73, Bahiaâ€™s Rossi is on his feet again at Estadio do Maracana.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Bahia.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Bahia throw-in in Flamengo's half.
In the minute 75, Daniel (Bahia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Everton Ribeiro for Flamengo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Bahia a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Free kick in a good position for Bahia!
Bahia drive upfield and Rossi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 80, Mano Menezes is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Clayson replacing Juan Pablo Ramirez.
Rodriguinho is replacing Gilberto for Bahia at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 81, Flamengo to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Goal! Flamengo go level at 3-3 through Pedro in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 82, Filipe Luis instrumental with a fine assist.
Bahia drives forward and Rodriguinho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Rodriguinho (Bahia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 84, Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
The home team replace Mauricio Isla with Vitinho.
In the minute 86, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Flamengo.
Rodriguinho is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 89, Matheuzinho is on a sub for Joao Gomes for Flamengo.
Diego is replacing Everton Ribeiro for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza will wait an extra 7 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Bahia just outside Flamengo's area.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Throw-in for Bahia at Estadio do Maracana.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
It's 4-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Vitinho gives Flamengo a 4-3 lead in Rio de Janeiro.
That's a fine assist from Pedro.
Daniel Bahia.
